name: Aztec Mythology
longDescription: Discover the mythology of the Fifth Sun. From Huitzilopochtli's war to Quetzalcoatl's wisdom, explore Mesoamerican cosmology.

metadata.lastUpdateReason: Added type field and expanded description

description: Mesoamerican Aztec mythology of the Fifth Sun, featuring solar deities like Huitzilopochtli and Quetzalcoatl, with complex cosmology and ritual practices.
